{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
def get_data(splits=None):
    return TabularRenewables(pd.concat(dfs), 
                       pre_process=FilterInconsistentSamplesPerDay, 
                       splits=splits,
                       cat_names="TaskID",
                       cont_names = [ 'WindSpeed58m', 'WindSpeed60m'],
                       y_names="PowerGeneration",
                      )
